desc: Senpai, welcome to the Echoes of Time! Let me show you the rules of this feature!
Here's the entrance, you can switch the World of Time you want to enter by tapping on corresponding areas.
This is the Echoes of Time achievement button. The achievements of this feature are displayed here.
This is the Echoes of Time stage button. There are many stages in each World of Time. You can challenge the stages at anytime you want!
Tap here and start your first Observation!
